<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bless Toxin](/Feats.aspx?ID=1176) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); deity who grants [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) divine font

</column>

---

You pour negative energy into toxins you create to further debilitate your targets. When you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) an alchemical poison (rather than create it with advanced alchemy, Quick Alchemy, or another means), it becomes a blessed alchemical poison and gains the [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) trait. When a creature is afflicted with a blessed alchemical poison, for 1 round, any Hit Points it would regain from a positive effect are reduced by 5, or by 10 if you are legendary in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4).
name: Bless Toxin
prerequisite: Master in Crafting; deity who grants _harm_ divine font
